vernac_cmds: Definition Zero_e (n:nat) : Cobham := Comp n Zero nil.
Lemma arity_Zero n : arity (Zero_e n) = ok_arity n.
Definition One_e (n:nat) : Cobham := Comp n (Comp 0 (Succ true) [Zero]) nil.
Lemma arity_One n : arity (One_e n) = ok_arity n.
Definition App_e : Cobham := Rec (Proj 1 0) (Comp 3 (Succ false) [Proj 3 1]) (Comp 3 (Succ true) [Proj 3 1]) (Comp 2 Smash [Comp 2 (Succ true) [Proj 2 0]; Comp 2 (Succ true) [Proj 2 1] ]).
destruct l as [ | u [ | v l] ]; simpl.
induction u as [ | [ | ] u IH]; simpl; omega.
induction u as [ | [ | ] u IH]; simpl; omega.
Lemma App_correct : forall l, Sem App_e l = hd nil l ++ hd nil (tl l).
Definition Rev_e : Cobham := Rec Zero (Comp 2 App_e [Proj 2 1; Comp 2 (Succ false) [Zero_e 2]]) (Comp 2 App_e [Proj 2 1; Comp 2 (Succ true) [Zero_e 2]]) (Proj 1 0).
Lemma Rev_correct l : Sem Rev_e l = List.rev (hd nil l).
Definition RemoveLSZ_e : Cobham := Rec Zero (Proj 2 1) (Comp 2 (Succ true) [Proj 2 0]) (Proj 1 0).
Lemma RemoveLSZ_app u v l : Sem RemoveLSZ_e ((u++v)::l) = match Sem RemoveLSZ_e (u::l) with | nil => Sem RemoveLSZ_e (v::l) | u' => u'++v end.
induction u as [ | [ | ] u IH]; trivial.
Definition Cond : Cobham := Rec (Proj 3 0) (Proj 5 4) (Proj 5 3) ( Comp 4 Smash [ Comp 4 (Succ true) [Proj 4 1]; Comp 4 Smash [ Comp 4 (Succ true) [Proj 4 2]; Comp 4 (Succ true) [Proj 4 3] ] ] ).
destruct (hd nil l); simpl; repeat rewrite nth_S_tl.
apply le_trans with ( S (S (length (nth 1 l nil)) * 1)).
apply le_trans with ( S (length (if b then nth 2 l nil else nth 3 l nil)) * 1).
apply le_trans with (S (S (length (nth 2 l nil)) * S (length (nth 3 l nil)))).
Lemma Cond_correct : forall l, Sem Cond l = match hd nil l with | nil => hd nil (tl l) | true::_ => hd nil (tl (tl l)) | false::_ => hd nil (tl (tl (tl l))) end.
destruct l as [ | [ | [ | ] v1] [ | v2 [ | v3 [ | v4 l] ] ] ]; trivial.

command: destruct l as [ | u [ | v l] ]; simpl.
induction u as [ | [ | ] u IH]; simpl; omega.
induction u as [ | [ | ] u IH]; simpl; omega.
induction u as [ | [ | ] u IH]; trivial.
destruct (hd nil l); simpl; repeat rewrite nth_S_tl.
apply le_trans with ( S (S (length (nth 1 l nil)) * 1)).
apply le_trans with ( S (length (if b then nth 2 l nil else nth 3 l nil)) * 1).
apply le_trans with (S (S (length (nth 2 l nil)) * S (length (nth 3 l nil)))).
destruct l as [ | [ | [ | ] v1] [ | v2 [ | v3 [ | v4 l] ] ] ]; trivial.
